SEARCH
Package nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.moveblocks

Interface IAnimationComponent

All Known Implementing Classes:
BigDoorAnimationComponent, ClockAnimationComponent, DrawbridgeAnimationComponent, FlagAnimationComponent, GarageDoorAnimationComponent, RevolvingDoorAnimationComponent, SlidingDoorAnimationComponent, VerticalAnimationComponent, WindmillAnimationComponent
public interface IAnimationComponent
Represents a component of an animation.

  • Method Details

    • getFinalPosition

      Vector3Dd getFinalPosition(IVector3D startLocation, float radius)
      Parameters:
      startLocation - The start location of a block.
      radius - The radius of the block to the rotation point.
      Returns:
      The final position of an IAnimatedBlock.

    • prepareAnimation

      default void prepareAnimation(IAnimator animator)
      Runs some optional steps before the animation is started.
      Parameters:
      animator - The animator responsible for the animation.

    • executeAnimationStep

      void executeAnimationStep(IAnimator animator, int ticks, int ticksRemaining)
      Runs a single step of the animation.
      Parameters:
      animator - The animator responsible for the animation.
      ticks - The number of ticks that have passed since the start of the animation.
      ticksRemaining - The number of ticks remaining in the animation.

    • getMovementMethod

      default Animator.MovementMethod getMovementMethod()
      Returns:
      The type of movement to apply to animated blocks.

      Subclasses are free to override this if a different type of movement is desired for that type.

      Each animated block is moved using Animator.MovementMethod.apply(IAnimatedBlock, Vector3Dd, int).

    • getRadius

      default float getRadius(int xAxis, int yAxis, int zAxis)
      Gets the radius of a block at the given coordinates.
      Parameters:
      xAxis - The x coordinate.
      yAxis - The y coordinate.
      zAxis - The z coordinate.
      Returns:
      The radius of a block at the given coordinates.

    • getStartAngle

      default float getStartAngle(int xAxis, int yAxis, int zAxis)
      Gets the starting angle of a block (in rads) at the given coordinates.
      Parameters:
      xAxis - The x coordinate.
      yAxis - The y coordinate.
      zAxis - The z coordinate.
      Returns:
      The starting angle of a block at the given coordinates.
